body:
Well it's definitely not me, but who do you think is the best pvper is? It can be on avicus or in any server.
 I think MR3FPS is the best pvper i've ever seen. Even though he mainly does 1v1's, he is also very good in FFA. He has perfectly timed strafes and never misses a hit.
